c74object.name: dada.analysis.energy
c74object.description: Finds the average velocity of a score.

outlet.description: Outputs the energy of the score, intended as the sum of all relative durations in the score (i.e. duration of notes, divided by the duration of the whole score), weighted by the corresponding velocities.

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the result of the analysis performed on the most recently received input data.

method.name: llll
method.description: An llll in the first inlet is considered as a bach.roll or bach.score gathered syntax on which the analysis should be performed. The result is then output through the outlet.

c74object.discussion: The energy is computed as the sum of all relative durations in the score (i.e. duration of notes, divided by the duration of the whole score), weighted by the corresponding velocities.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Score energy. Outputs the energy of the score, intended as the sum of all relative durations in the score (i.e. duration of notes, divided by the duration of the whole score), weighted by the corresponding velocities.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The energy is computed as the sum of all relative durations in the score (i.e. duration of notes, divided by the duration of the whole score), weighted by the corresponding velocities.

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: analysis, loudness, energy, velocity, duration, sum.
